item.title: Here's a look at food served inside MLB stadiums — including a 26-inch burrito
item.description: Fans spend an average of about $75 on food and drinks at a Major League Baseball game with specialty food a staple at the ballpark.

item.title: When will the 2025 conclave bring a new pope?
item.description: Catholic cardinals are gathering at the Vatican for the 2025 conclave to choose Pope Francis' successor. Here's how long it could take.

item.title: Watch Live: White smoke from conclave signals a new pope is chosen
item.description: White smoke has streamed from the chimney of the Sistine Chapel at the Vatican, signaling that Catholic cardinals in the conclave have chosen a new po...

item.title: Here's what the name of a pope signifies
item.description: The pope's name will help indicate what direction he wants to take the church.

item.title: Trump administration releases 60,000 more files on RFK assassination
item.description: President Trump ordered the release of files on Sen. Robert F. Kennedy's assassination — with the backing of the senator's son, Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
